# ShareLint - Social Media Link Preview Checker

> Check how URLs appear on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Discord, and Slack before sharing. Fix broken previews in seconds.

ShareLint is a free tool that validates Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags, showing exactly how your links will appear when shared on social media platforms.

## Core Tools

- /facebook-preview - Facebook link preview checker with OG tag validation
- /twitter-preview - Twitter card validator (free alternative since Twitter removed theirs)
- /linkedin-preview - LinkedIn post preview tester for professionals
- /discord-preview - Discord embed preview checker with theme color support
- /slack-preview - Slack unfurl preview tester

## Platform Specifications

### Facebook
- Image size: 1200x630 pixels (1.91:1 ratio)
- Title: 60 characters max
- Description: 65 characters shown

### Twitter/X
- Image size: 1200x628 pixels for summary_large_image
- Image size: 144x144 to 4096x4096 for summary cards
- Title: 70 characters max
- Card types: summary, summary_large_image, player, app

### LinkedIn
- Image size: 1200x627 pixels (1.91:1 ratio)
- Title: 70 characters shown
- Uses Open Graph meta tags

### Discord
- Image size: 1200x630 pixels for large embeds
- Supports theme-color meta tag for embed sidebar color
- Max file size: 8MB

### Slack
- Image size: 1200x630 pixels recommended
- Minimum: 250x250 pixels
- Uses Open Graph meta tags

## Common Questions

Q: What is the best OG image size?
A: 1200x630 pixels works on all platforms without cropping.

Q: How do I clear Facebook's preview cache?
A: Use Facebook's Sharing Debugger tool to scrape your URL again.

Q: Why isn't my Twitter card showing?
A: Twitter (now X) requires twitter:card meta tag. Use ShareLint's free validator to diagnose issues.

Q: How do I customize Discord embed colors?
A: Add <meta name="theme-color" content="#HEX"> to your page's head.
